message: Accept this generous offer and we can call it a day!
Take a smaller share now, or risk losing more later!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
My turn to meet you in the middle!
50/50 split, let's call it a draw!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving in yet!
A slight adjustment, but still a fair deal!
I'm not getting any younger, and I need a bigger share!
Last chance, Bob! Meet me in the middle, or walk away empty-handed!
You're running out of chances, Alice. I'm taking what I can get!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or walk away with nothing!
